actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a refundable credit for expenditures for renewable energy property.
short_title: Renewable Energy Act for Credit on Taxes

summary.text: Renewable Energy Act for Credit on Taxes - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a refundable limited credit through 2007 for expenditures for qualifying renewable energy property (solar water heating, photovoltaic, wind energy, or fuel cell properties) installed on or in connection with a U.S.-sited residential or nonresidential structure.

titles.title: Renewable Energy Act for Credit on Taxes
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a refundable credit for expenditures for renewable energy property.
